snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown’s office said that the cancer was caught in its early stages and that Mr. Brown, 74, would continue to work a full schedule.
abstract: California Gov Jerry Brown is undergoing treatment for localized prostate cancer caught in its early stages; he is expected to be treated without significant side effects or disruption to his work schedule.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown’s office said that the cancer was caught in its early stages and that Mr. Brown, 74, would continue to work a full schedule.

headline.seo: California: Governor Brown Being Treated for Prostate Cancer
headline.main: California: Governor Being Treated for Prostate Cancer
headline.print_headline: California: Governor Being Treated For Prostate Cancer
